---
title: "The New James Kronan"
author:
  - name: Emil Luci
date: 09-10-2022
output:
  distill::distill_article:
    self_contained: false
---

Thick black streaks of paint hurriedly slashed across a virgin canvas. Slowly the words materialized. 'What has been done cannot be undone'. The canvas was then lit on fire.
